skills.skill: GCP Cloud Native ETL / ELT services
Monitoring, Logging, Auditing services of GCP
Cortex framework on GCP for integrating with SAP
Networking on GCP and Gateway connectivity
Cloud Functions, Cloud Composer, Apache Airflow

duties_responsibilities.duty: Implementing a medium/large scale Data Warehouse solution.
Operationalizing large scale ingestion, processing, consumption using dataflow or cloud fusion.
Ingesting data through API’s or integration tools such as Mulesoft or Boomi.
Designing and implementing storage infrastructure and event-based architecture using Cloud Functions.
Integrating with SAP using Cortex framework on GCP.
Orchestrating data using Cloud Functions, Cloud Composer, Apache Airflow or related.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master’s preferred)
